channel.title: Web Development on CS 210 Build Guide

item.title: Start Here
item.description:
Basic Website Setup

Below is a quick setup guide for building a website with Next.js and Vercel – Perfect infrastructure to add V0 code to!!

Project Setup

First check if you have Node: ’’' node -v ’’' If not download Node and verify with: ’’' node -v ’’' Next create a new web project. This line has some presets that should integrate well with V0 code. ’’' npx create-next-app@latest project-name –typescript –eslint –tailwind –app –src-dir –import-alias “@/*” ’’' Say no to Turbopack. Navigate to the project-name directory: ’’' cd project-name ’’' Go to v0, sign up and prompt it to build a website of your choosing.
